title: Kaew Ta Pee
overview: Chisanu is a wealthy man who lost his eye-sight and love when he was involved in a terrible car accident.One day, he bumps into the beautiful kindergarden teacher Nathlada who has just been dumped and about the commit suicide. Nathlada however changed her mind and starts falling in love with Chisanu, who has been so kind to her.After Chisanu's surgery in France, his ex wants to return to him and will do everything in their utmost power to get him back.
